column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////We waited for 1 hour on a late Friday morning to eat here because the reviews were so impressive.  There is a nice lobby area to wait in but beware of the security guard who will watch everyone like a hawk to warn them not to sit on/touch/lean against the Christmas displays or sit on the floor
column2: or the arm of the chairs
column3: etc - she made everyone feel very unwelcome in the lobby.  Once we sat down the server was very friendly and helpful.  The good - fresh squeezed OJ
column6: plain pancakes.  The not so good - pasty oatmeal
column8: berry bliss pancakes.  Food was decent overall but not worth the long wait.
